overview: Azusa Sato, a staff member of Shinrei Manjara, disappeared. A psychic video delivered to the psychic Urabon staff Maijo Moisa. There is a miserable bizarre phenomenon and the figure of Sato. In place of Ryo Matsumoto, who collapsed from lung disease, Maijo follows the truth of the posted psychic image and the whereabouts of Sato.
title: Manjara NotEqual Urabon
